dataRecovery.description: If the error persists, you can perform a hard reset that will clear all stored data and reset the application to its default state. This will delete your floor plans and configurations.
dataRecovery.dialogDescription: This will delete all your data including floor plans, configurations, and materials. This action cannot be undone.
dataRecovery.title: Data Recovery Option

boundary.description: The application encountered an unexpected error and cannot continue.
boundary.title: Something went wrong

error.geometryProcessing: An error occurred during geometry processing

infill.notEnoughSpaceForStraw: Not enough space for infilling straw
infill.notEnoughSpaceForTwoPosts: Space for more than one post, but not enough for two
infill.notEnoughVerticalSpace: Not enough vertical space to fill with straw

layer.parallelLines: Could not determine stripe positions due to parallel lines.

opening.headerDoesNotFit: Header does not fit: needs {{required, length}} but only {{available, length}} available

opening.sillDoesNotFit: Sill does not fit: needs {{required, length}} but only {{available, length}} available

post.crossSectionMismatch: Cross section does not match available options for this material
post.dimensionsMismatch: Post dimensions ({{width, length}}Ã—{{thickness, length}}) don't match available cross sections

ringBeam.doubleNotSupported: Double ring beam construction is not yet supported.

straw.tooThick: Wall is too thick for a single strawbale
straw.tooThin: Wall is too thin for a single strawbale

feature.defaultMessage: This feature encountered an error and cannot be displayed.
feature.dialogDescription: This will delete all your data including floor plans, configurations, and materials. This action cannot be undone.

modal.defaultMessage: This content could not be displayed due to an error.
